title: Ethereal Dreams
description: A visual exploration of surreal landscapes and dreamlike atmospheres. This project combines motion design with 3D elements to create an immersive brand experience.

title: Urban Pulse
description: A dynamic web experience for a modern city guide. Features interactive maps and real-time data visualization.

title: Botanical Series
description: An illustrated collection celebrating organic forms and natural patterns. Each piece tells a story of growth and transformation.

title: Neon Nights
description: A retro-futuristic animation series exploring cyberpunk aesthetics and glitch art techniques.

title: Minimal Luxury
description: High-end e-commerce platform with focus on typography and white space. Less is more.

title: Sound Waves
description: Visual identity for a music streaming platform. Motion-driven interface that responds to audio input.

title: Earth Tones
description: Sustainable fashion brand identity featuring earthy palettes and organic textures.

title: Digital Garden
description: Interactive portfolio site with growing animations and playful micro-interactions.
